Joseph Kamau

Hi!

I am excited you have visited my portfolio navigate through the pages to get acquainted on my abilities.

Thoughts on web and myself

World Wide Web is an amazing dimension of our universe and has transformed most of human interactions in profound ways.
The web pages are the most frequently visited system in today's internet. Being on the public side they compete for users attention with aesthetic, ease of use and level of functionality. This is a challenge to developers to make the pages most appealing and enable users perform their work to expectation.

This where web developer magic wand come into play. Since I am really excited and enthused to modernize web architectures in order to impact best on others.
That is my life calling and belief to help other browse with pleasure.

Education

Current Level

I am 3rd year student at Dedan Kimathi University of Technology. I undertake the Bsc. in Computer Science and major in software development.

I have taken classes on basics of programming, operating systems platforms, data structures, algorithms, design patterns and software engineering.

I enhanced that knowledge with more practice and acquired much more on the internet.
